body:
Dear Presenters:


If you wish to attend the Radiance workshop and give a talk, now is  
the time to send us a title and abstract.  So far, we have titles  
from a handful of presenters, and abstracts from just a few.  It  
seems to happen this way every year, but the sooner we get these  
materials, the better everyone's experience will be.  So, if at all  
possible, please send a complete abstract via e-mail to Raphaël  
Compagnon <Raphael.Compagnon at hefr.ch> and myself  
<gregoryjward at gmail.com> by this Friday, August 15th.


Thank you.
-Greg
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2008-August/005304.html).</sup>
